thread.title: Arvind Kejriwal to undergo treatment in Bengaluru for high blood sugar
thread.title_full: Arvind Kejriwal to undergo treatment in Bengaluru for high blood sugar

author: Rahul Kumar
title: Arvind Kejriwal to undergo treatment in Bengaluru for high blood sugar
text:
Arvind Kejriwal to undergo treatment in Bengaluru for high blood sugar Arvind Kejriwal to undergo treatment in Bengaluru for high blood sugar Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal will on February 7 leave for Bengaluru where he will undergo naturopathy treatment for high blood sugar. By: PTI | New Delhi | Published: February 5, 2017 5:48 PM “The chief minister’s blood sugar level has shot up. He is taking insulin thrice a day to keep it under control. (PTI) 
Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal will on February 7 leave for Bengaluru where he will undergo naturopathy treatment for high blood sugar. He returned to the national capital yesterday after spearheading AAP’s aggressive campaign for Punjab Assembly polls. 
“The chief minister’s blood sugar level has shot up. He is taking insulin thrice a day to keep it under control. 
“He will leave for Bengaluru on February 7 to undergo naturopathy treatment. Also, he has fever. He will be there for 12-14 days,” said a senior Delhi government official. 
Watch This Also: 
In January last year, Kejriwal had undergone 12 days of naturopathy treatment at the same institute for chronic cough and diabetes. 
The chief minister had also undergone a throat surgery at Narayana Hospital in Bengaluru in September last year.
